bike.description: Fully independent cross-country suspension at a hardtail weight. OCLV® 120 Carbon is unusually light, strong, and fast. Absorbs shocks while providing incredible feel and response.

components.description: RockShox SID Race, All Travel 63/80mm, Dual Air, external rebound control, Pure DeLite damping

Bontrager Race Lite Tubeless: Durable and World Class fast; Uses a regular tire/tube, or tubeless tires for increased control and reduced flats; Swiss-made hubs; Race Lite skewers; 710 g, 24h front/975 g, 28h rear
AHS 1-1/8" alloy cups, semi cartridge, sealed
